ygData.subject: Runed Totem Staff and Skull of Jhen 'Tra  **SPOILER**
ygData.msgSnippet: Ladies and gentleman, I recently acquired a Runed Totem Staff and a skull and tried to combine them by placing said skull on my picture while I held the staff.
ygData.messageBody:
Ladies and gentleman,

I recently acquired a Runed Totem Staff and a skull and tried to combine
them by placing said skull on my picture while I held the staff. Didn't
work. I then tried a huge number of other cominations with no luck. When i
bought this skull from a friend he billed it as the skull of Vier Dal. Like
an idiot, i didn't check it out. It turns out its the Skull of Jhen 'Tra.
Stats are mana +20, SV magic +3, Wt. 2.5, Race and Class: All. When I
queried my friend he said the skull came from the same gnoll as the Skull of
Vier Dal and it should still work. The stats appear to be very similar.

3 questions:

1. Has anyone seen the Skull of Jhen 'Tra and know how to utilize it?

2. Will this skull attach to the Runed Totem Staff?

3. How do you attach this skull or the skull of Vier Dal to the staff? Has
anyone succesfully dropped it on their picture, or is this just hearsay?

Thank you in advance for your help,

"Maureen", lvl 12 wizard, Povar
